nodes.text: The Vriisan irstat was a Tarasin tribe.
The Vriisan irstat lived in the jungles of the planet Cularin. When the explorer Reidi Artom discovered Cularin, she left a number of writings inside a cave, which the Vriisan became custodians of.
About 30 years before the Clone Wars, Niroida was the Mother of the irstat and she was succeeded by Kasslan.
